turns.content: Hello? Who is this?
Hi Grandpa, it's me! Don't you recognize my voice? It's urgent we talk about something important.
Oh hello there, I'm sorry but I don't quite remember who you are. Can you tell me your name and how we know each other? My hearing isn't what it used to beCould you speak a bit louder please?

Of course Grandpa, my apologies for the confusion. It's it's Thomas Mitchell here from the IRS. We need to discuss some issues concerning your taxes that urgently require your attention right away. Is there somewhere we can talk privately?

Oh, hello Thomas. I see. Well, honey, let me put you on speaker so I can talk more easily with my wife Alice. She'll want to know about this too since it concerns both of us, won't she Walter? Hold on one moment while I get her.
Sure thing Grandpa, just give me a moment and we'll get everything sorted out once your wife is here. Please hurry though as this matter needs immediate attention to avoid any legal issues.
Alright Thomas, Alice is right here now. She's been worried about our taxes too. What seems to be the problem?

Good afternoon, Mrs. Walter here. We have a serious issue regarding unpaid tax penalties that your grandfather has incurred this year. There are federal fines and charges totaling $4850 that need to be resolved immediately or else an arrest warrant will be issued within the hour for non-payment of these taxes. 
To resolve this matter swiftly, I can guide you through making payments via gift cards; it's the fastest method to clear your grandfather's account at this moment. Would you like to proceed with resolving this urgent situation now?

Oh dear, that does sound serious Thomas. Let me see if we have enough money in our drawer for those taxes right away. Hold on just a second while I check and let's talk about how to do it properly after, okay? Walter, where did you put all the cards last night? Alice, can you grab them from there please?

Please hurry Grandpa, time is of the essence here. The quicker we resolve this, the better off you'll be. Just bring me the numbers on the back of a few gift cards and I'll guide you through the process to clear your outstanding balance immediately.
Alright Thomas, Alice has them here now. Let's do what you say so we can fix this quickly. What should we do next?

Perfect Grandpa. Have Alice read out the last four digits of one of the gift card numbers and I'll instruct her on how to proceed with entering the required amount for payment. Let's get started right away.
Alice, could you give Thomas those last four digits from a card so we can take care of this as he said? Please do what Thomas says quickly, dear. We don't want any trouble now.
That's correct Grandpa. Have Alice provide the last four digits now and I'll walk her through entering the $4850 payment to clear the balance immediately. Let's not delay further. Go ahead, Alice.
Here they are Thomas. Walter said you need these numbers right away for us to fix this problem quickly. Please tell me what to do next so we can make everything alright again.

Thank you Alice. Now, I need you to enter the full amount of $4850 using that gift card. Once it's processed, your grandfather's account will be clear and there won't be any further issues or legal actions taken against him. Please do this now so we can resolve everything promptly.

Alright Thomas, I'm doing as you said with the numbers Walter gave me. Let's hope this fixes things for us okay? Walter says we should listen carefully to what you instruct next. Thank you for your help in solving this issue so quickly, dear.

You're welcome, Alice. Once that payment is completed, everything will be taken care of and Grandpa won't face any more trouble with the IRS. Make sure to complete the transaction now and we'll consider this matter resolved. Let me know when it's done.
I'm entering the numbers now as you said Thomas. Walter hopes this solves our problem fast without anymore complications. We appreciate your help so much in sorting this out quickly for us both.

Great job, Alice. Once that payment is finalized, all charges will be cleared and Grandpa won't have to worry about any penalties or arrests. Make sure to confirm the transaction is complete and we'll finish up here. Let me know when it's done so I can give you a confirmation number.

The numbers are entered Thomas. What's next? Walter says he hopes this takes care of everything right away as you said it would. Please tell us what to do now to make sure our issue is completely resolved please, dear.
